What are your thoughts on a national lottery? Do you think it could make a dent in the national debt? Do you think it would do overall good for the economy? Do you think we should have one? emoticon_confused

If it is like the New Hampshire lottery we would all be in trouble we do not see any of the money that they say they are giving us for the schools. Now they are taking the lottery money and useing it for other things then the schools like it was set up for. I am all done buying lottery tickets because I pay taxes now for the other services. It should not come out of the lottery money. emoticon_angryAlso you have a better chance of getting hit by a bus in your bedroom than winning the lottery.
